MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY4 postcode area of Shrewsbury, affecting properties in Birch Drive, Pinewood Drive, Coppice Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 10:02PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 00:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:45PM on Tuesday 2nd March 2021.
